connection_string.title: Connection String
connection_string.description: Couchbase connection string. For more information, check out our docs

username.title: Username
username.description: Username to use for authentication to Couchbase.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to use for authentication to Couchbase.

bucket.title: Bucket Name
bucket.description: Name of the Couchbase bucket to use as the destination.

scope.title: Scope Name
scope.description: Name of the scope within the bucket. If not specified, the default scope will be used.

collection.title: Collection Name
collection.description: Name of the collection within the scope. If not specified, the default collection will be used.
